title: Software Engineer (Summer 2024 Internship)
purpose: To work on all aspects of application development during the summer internship
duties_responsibilities: Front-end development using frameworks such as React, Angular, and Flutter
Data storage and retrieval using SQL, NoSQL, and Graph databases
Developing backend tech stacks using Python, GO, and JavaScript
required_qualifications: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Software Engineering (CS, CS+, CE) at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign
Expected graduation on or after December 2024
Must be a US Citizen, permanent resident, or be an MS student with work authorization (F1 Visa on CPT accepted only for masters-level students)
preferred_qualifications: Experience with team software development using Agile practices
Knowledge of microservices-based software architecture and containerization
Familiarity with cloud-based DevOps methodologies and processes
